Keenan Druce

https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/layered-ceiling-baffles/

Thanks Joel.

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Creative Lead

Hi Keenan,

Thanks for sending the svg,

We have now updated the page. Let me know if this works for you?

https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/layered-ceiling-baffles/

Morning Joel,

Hope you're well.

Attached are the updated designs for the Layered page, these should be at a much higher resolution, if they could be brought up closer to the image carousel and have less white space around them that would be ideal.

Just one other thing I've noticed is the colourways, not all of the colourways have pulled across. If you could pull across the whole range but remove 'natural' that would be great.

As always if there is anything I can help with, please let me know

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Creative Lead

Yes, we have resized the image manually. If you could send us a much higher reso that would be great.

Thanks Joel.

Let me know if there are any issues. Otherwise I'll get the team to have a look to see if there is anything else to update

Hi @joel Im done updating the framework draft page colourways

✅ #4: Layered baffle colourways are our full FilaSorb collection (done)

@rica (Time:10mins)

Remaining Task

  • #1: Framework slider images to be placed under the carousel (the PDF here shows where this needs to be pdf_16x16.pngFramework.pdf) (pending)
  • #2: Framework colourways to be our full FilaSorb range and our full WBQ collection (pending)
  • #3: Layered Baffles slider images to be under the carousel (pending)

Note for #1 and #3:
The client would like to add slider images below the carousel, similar to the layout shown in the framework.pdf. However, there are currently no options available in the custom post type fields to upload these images. 

Note for #2:
it appears they want to add two categories: "Full Filasorb" and "Full WBQ." However, the custom post type field currently only allows for one category to be added. Could you please look into this?

Thanks
